name: Cybertron  Restart
author: DTO
notes:
MVP for this deck is fire formation-gyokkou & xing zhen hu. IMO, I'll rate restart>balance>mindscan for this particular deck list. Because brick is real in mind scan. As for balance, I would suggest running 3 senjus + 2 petit. 
Gyokkou comes in handy against most of the current meta decks *be sure to activate it before summoning.
Xing zhen hu helps alot in locking down tight back row too.
This is a deck where you'll have a high % in OTK-ing early game.
Special thanks to Negative1 - CA Expert  for skill and techs suggestions^^ thank you senpai
